comments.content:
Marvellous. I used to walk past a tyre sales place every day that had lettering painted into the window saying **"FREE" TYRE CHECK** , and I always wondered to myself, is it free, or isn't it?

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Ever since I chose to block pop-ups, my toaster's stopped working.
